summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 45th Street, from 43rd Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7134 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
